TopicTitle: GUYS PLEASE HELP, I CANT SAVE ANYTHING

Articles.Content: Guys, everything in my Resume Menu is gone, I tried to rename like that but it wont work, I also tried to create new game then save it but it wont appear in my resume menu it only appears in the save folders of my ksp..

Hey, I'm not certain what you're saying exactly but it's possible you're describing a problem I had.

Can you open the save folder within Windows (or Linux or whatever) and organise the files by last modified. I had a problem where the persistent.sfs file was truncated because it wasn't saved properly and was thus much smaller than the other files. I solved it by deleting that file and making a copy of a recent save and renaming it persistent.sfs 

If you do this, you should backup the original files just in case. Good luck.

2 hours ago, Seth Kerman said:

guys, downloaded a mod, opened my ksp, RESUME GAME IS EMPTY, my game i had was called "default" but its still in my save directory in ksp, tried to create a new game called "default" says that i mights overwrite data so nope, pls help, u will save 100 hours gameplay please..

 

1. Dont use Capslock - ppl will ignore you then
1.1: Dont post multiple times - ppl will ignore u then
2. post screenshots of your save-folder with complete path visible
3. post a log when the savegame is not visible
4. name the mod u downloaded
5. why not remove the mod?
6. use "." so ppl can actually read what u are saying
